section.title: &kw-hos-tm; 5.0.2: Release Notes
section.para: An overview of the features contained within Version 5.0.2, including known issues and workarounds for this release.

section.title: New in this release
section.para: &kw-hos-tm; 5.0.2 introduces support for RHEL 7.3 compute nodes.

section.title: Fixed in this release
section.para: The CLI for freezerclient API has been depreciated in the newton base. The python-freezerclient which has been added to &kw-hos-tm; 5.0.2 is the new CLI method to manage freezer services. More information on the python-freezerclient can be found in the OpenStack freezerclient docs:
Rebooting of the VM's is no longer required if the tenant network type is VLAN. VxLAN tenant networks will still need to be rebooted to allow for traffic to flow through.

The default value for DefaultTasksMax setting for SLES is 512. This affected MySQL's ability to fork new threads. This change adds a new task file to deal with systemd tuning and sets DefultTasksMax to the special value infinity.
